description: Good first issue, App Ideas, Beautiful Dingbats, GitHub CLI, The JavaScript Way and more...

items.title: Good first issue
items.description: A list of issues from popular open-source projects, which helps you make your first contribution.

items.title: cra-template-redux
items.description: Yesterday the first release of the redux template for create-react-app was released.

items.title: App Ideas
items.description: A large list ideas for apps to improve your coding skills.

items.title: Beautiful Dingbats' Pattern Generator
items.description: A nice generator for seamless repeatable background patterns.

items.description: A free course about browser-based user interfaces using HTML and CSS only.

items.title: GitHub CLI
items.description: The article by GitHub, introducing the new GitHub CLI and what it can do.

items.title: The JavaScript Way
items.description: A beginner-friendly, open source book about JavaScript.

items.title: Turbulence
items.description: A cool CodePen using animated SVG filter on hover.

items.title: skillstream.dev
items.description: A website to create a timeline of your developer skills in form of a Gantt chart.

items.title: Stage.js
items.description: A 2D JavaScript library for creating HTML5 games.
